articles.title: Mombasa port cargo outperforms forecasts amid lingering congestion
articles.description: Kenya Ports Authority says cargo volumes through the Mombasa port hit a high record 45.45 million metric tonnes in 2025, up from 40.99 million tonnes processed at the facility in 2024.
articles.content:
Cranes offloading containers from MV Jolly Giada LOA at the Port of Mombasa on March 6, 2024. [File, Standard]

articles.title: Ndindi Nyoro wins big as Kenya Power declares dividends
articles.description: Kenya Power’s board declared a dividend of 30 cents per share, a 50 per cent increase from 20 cent for a single share paid last year.
